t: Drunken online shopping is big business — especially for Amazon | Mashable
s: Amazon is already more than dominant in the online shopping space, but add a shot or three of tequila and that Amazon Prime free two-day shipping looks even more appealing. t: Shopping Under the Influence – Drunk on Amazon | RM Warner
s: October 18, 2023 - They also found that Amazon was the “drunk shopping” platform of choice, perhaps due to their quick and easy features that make drunk shopping that much easier. Now, do us a favor and think back to the last drunk purchase you may have made. Everyone has their own stories of drunken regret.

t: The 2019 Drunk Shopping Census - The Hustle
s: February 9, 2024 - Extrapolating this further, we determined the average lifetime spend on drunk purchases is $4,187 — good for a total drunken expenditure of nearly half a trillion dollars.
